description: exp/norm: Adopt regexp to exp/regexp semantics.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

Not sure why it matters but it's fine.

Main purpose was to remove the TODO and I found the different regexps
slightly nicer. It also prevents an error if the file format is changed to
not include a \n at the end of the last test.

On Fri, Sep 16, 2011 at 4:19 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> Not sure why it matters but it's fine.
>



-- 
Trying this for a while: http://go/OnlyCheckEmailTwiceADay.
Marcel van Lohuizen -- Google Switzerland GmbH -- Identifikationsnummer:
CH-020.4.028.116-1

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ed37cd707c4d ***
